item.description:
Maurizio Pollini is one of the greatest living concert pianists and is noted for his eloquence and aristocratic approach to the piano. This all-Chopin program is being presented by the "Celebrity Series Boston" and is a wonderful opportunity to hear a true living legend.

People need to buy their own tickets by calling the Symphony Hall box office directly at (888) 266-1200.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Cabot-Cahners room (upstairs) as a group @2:30 p.m.
item.name: Maurizio Pollini at Symphony Hall
